# Government Tender Announcement

## Request for Supply Arrangements (RFSA)

### Contract Title and Number

* Title: In-Water Vessel Cleaning
* Solicitation Number: F7044-200268/E
* Reference Number: PW-__MD-046-28848
* Amendment Number: 1

### Contract Description

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites suppliers to submit a Request for Supply Arrangements (RFSA) for the provision of in-water vessel cleaning services.

### Trade Agreement Compliance

This contract is subject to the provisions of the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP), the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Requirements and Deliverables

Suppliers must provide in-water vessel cleaning services to various Government of Canada departments and agencies on an as-and-when-requested basis. The services must be delivered to the Identified Users across Canada, including areas subject to Comprehensive Land Claims Agreements (CLCAs).

### Duration and Options

The period for awarding contracts under the Supply Arrangement will be for a period of two (2) years, with a possibility of an additional five (5) one (1) year option periods.

### Tender Evaluation Criteria

The bid solicitation of any resulting Supply Arrangement may be subject to different Trade Agreements depending on the Identified User for whom the procurement is conducted. Suppliers will be evaluated based on the lowest/ lower bid.

### Submission and Communication

All interested suppliers may submit a bid. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Suppliers must use the epost Connect service provided by Canada Post Corporation to transmit their arrangement to the Supply Arrangement Authority.

### Contact Information

For further information, please contact:

* Name: Dianne Tinkess (046md)
* Email: Dianne.Tinkess@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Phone: (819) 271-7829
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada

### Document Submission

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. Supplier must refer to Part 2 of the RFSA entitled Supplier Instructions and Part 3 of the RFSA entitled Arrangement Preparation Instructions for further information on using the epost Connect service
